nodes.text: Task Group Destruction was a flotilla that was assembled by the Cularin Armed Forces, a division of the Republic Military, during the time of the Clone Wars. The unit included the light cruiser Vigilance, some G61 Delta Wings, two support vessels, some clone marines and the Heroes of Cularin, and was commanded by Captain Suubrin. It was dispatched to a deserted system in about 19 BBY, to carry out a raid on an abandoned Separatist base.
